name: Boar's Revenge: Nature is coming!
description:
Nature vs Industry! Who will win the battle?  The industry is taking over and  only Gery the Boar can stand up for nature and his home!

 As  the boar you have to destroy  industry buildings by running into them. Achieve XP by doing so and cleanse your home from the evil buildings!

As the industry player you have to build up your little empire and be smart with your resources. Build your final huge building to vanish the animals from this land!

A team of 5 people from SAE VIENNA   created this project for the SAE WWF Game Jam:

Mercedes Vorwahlner - Modeling and Texturing

Christopher Zwölfer - Lead Programming

Alexander Pöschl - UI Design and Programming

Michael Hauptmann - Rigging and Animations

Andreas Csitkovits - Game Design and Tech Art
